OpenFlow.NBAPI
Class HostInfo

java.lang.Object
  OpenFlow.NBAPI.HostInfo

public class HostInfo
extends java.lang.Object

Retains switch and link-layer-address information for an IP (v4) address.

A HostInfo object is a cache entry for switch and link-layer-address information retrieved via one of the ControllerContext lookupHostInfo() methods. The cache entry is populated by immutable instance members -- thus the object content will not be updated over time (rather, new cache entry objects will be created as new ARP data is received or from server ControllerSupport/GetIPAddrInfo requests) and must be refreshed by subsequent ControllerContext queries.
